title: World Health Organization calls for pause on COVID-19 booster shots in US, certain countries until 2022; 'I will not stay silent'
content:
1. World Health Organization calls for pause on COVID-19 booster shots in US, certain countries until 2022; 'I will not stay silent'  WGHP FOX 8 Greensboro
  2. White House calls WHO criticism on COVID booster shots a 'false choice'  Yahoo News
  3. WHO Chief Urges Halt to Covid-19 Booster Shots Until Next Year  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  4. WHO urges rich countries to hold off on booster shots until 2022  Al Jazeera English
  5. Do You Need to Space Out Your Flu Shot and COVID Booster? We Asked Experts  Yahoo Lifestyle
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 世界保健機関（WHO）、米国および一部の国でのCOVID-19ブースター注射の2022年までの休止を要請、「沈黙はしない」。
世界卫生组织呼吁在2022年前暂停在美国和某些国家进行COVID-19强化注射；"我不会保持沉默。
世界衛生組織呼籲在2022年前暫停在美國和某些國家進行COVID-19強化注射；"我不會保持沉默。
